childMarkdownRemark.html:
Endless Knot creates the highest quality rugs at every price point to elevate corporate and hospitality interior design. From custom hand-knotted rugs created knot by knot in Nepal to beautiful designs ready and waiting to ship to your project, we have something for every timeline and budget.

No matter what type of rug you order — from our Hand-knotted, Hand-tufted, Anthology, Omni, or Heirloom collections — our dedicated team guarantees a seamless experience that will help maximize your project’s efficiency.

internal.content:
__Endless Knot__ creates the highest quality rugs at every price point to elevate corporate and hospitality interior design. From custom hand-knotted rugs created knot by knot in Nepal to beautiful designs ready and waiting to ship to your project, we have something for every timeline and budget.

No matter what type of rug you order — from our Hand-knotted, Hand-tufted, Anthology, Omni, or Heirloom collections — our dedicated team guarantees a seamless experience that will help maximize your project’s efficiency.

siteMetadata.title: Loop Architectural Materials
siteMetadata.description: Design & technical partner to the Arizona A+D community, Loop Architectural Materials represents leading brands in contract furniture, glass, and architectural/interior design products.
